string_table.str: Boost the movement speed of all friendly units on the battlefield
Increase line of sight and weapon range of all friendly units on the battlefield
Fire high damage missiles in a specified direction
Call in a swarm of Aggressor Sentinels to attack nearby enemies
Slam the ground, shove enemies away, and briefly slow them
Enrage all friendly units, boosting their damage and speed
Deploy a building that infantry can garrison in for protection
Infused gel areas flare up and deal damage
Unleash and direct a damaging plasma beam
Briefly deploy the Condor super unit
Boost targets' damage, healing, and speed. Playing other cards increases this buff's duration
Heal friendly units in the area over a long duration
Unleash and direct a vortex that damages enemies and spreads infusion gel.
Damage and instantly freeze target enemies
Place mines that damage and chill or freeze affected enemies. Triggered by ground units
Create a lasting storm that chills and slowly freezes enemy units
Blast an area to damage and briefly stun enemy vehicles and aircraft
Take momentary control of enemy mechanical units
Call in a mob of weak, controllable Grunts
Create several holograms of friendly units to deceive the enemy
Call in a swarm of Engineers to heal nearby allied troops
Manually drop multiple ice barriers to obstruct movement and chill nearby enemies
Boost the armor and weapon range of target allied vehicles and turrets
Call in an assault Lich and grant the Rush keyword to any cards deployed near the Lich
Launch a high damage slug to blast a target area
Temporarily %1 and %2 all allied units, and increase their speed
Briefly speed up all friendly Mechs and make them invulnerable
Heal friendly units in range over a short duration
Barrage target area with damaging methane barrels that choke enemies and buff allied Grunts
Place Mines that damage ground units and leave infusion gel upon exploding. Triggered by ground units
Place mines that damage ground units with burning plasma. Triggered by ground units
Place mines that damage and slow ground units. Triggered by ground units
Aim drop pods that crash to the ground and deploy ODST Infantry
Randomly call one of Omega Team's three Spartans to battle
Encircle target area with Pelican Gunships to deal heavy damage
Deal massive damage at target area with a ring of plasma beams
Blast target area for light but quick damage
Deploy a temporary turret with %1 to inspire allied troops
Infusion pools grant healing for a brief time
Grant brief invulnerability and a longer healing aura to friendly units in the target area
Bombard target area with wreckage from a destroyed Banished warship
Briefly deploy the Scarab super unit
Unleash a series of damaging plasma beams
Blast target area to damage enemies, shattering frozen enemies for massive damage
Deploy a temporary Shield Tower that protects units within its radius
Deploy a temporary long-range siege turret
Heal nearby allies and harm nearby enemies for a short duration
Deploy several controllable Skitterers who can also attach to your other units
Greatly boost the effectiveness of any %1 on the battlefield for a short time
Call in an armed Spirit Transport to drop off Banished units
Trap all units in a temporary, impenetrable prison. Trapped units cannot capture zones
Draw a wall of energy that stuns passing enemies and lowers their armor
Select any group of units and move them to target location
Place numerous, durable mines that heavily damage ground units. Triggered by ground units
Open a rift that pulls in nearby enemies for its duration
Draw a wall of Lekgolo worms that obstructs movement
Place a tower with %1 and a long sight range
This unit explodes violently on death, damaging enemy troops in its radius.
This unit is hidden and cannot be targeted for a short period, unless revealed by an enemy with Detect.
This unit detects and reveals nearby Cloaked enemies.
This unit intimidates nearby enemy troops, significantly reducing their armor.
This unit covers nearby allies, receiving all damage they would normally take.
When this unit falls in battle, a number of infantry troops jump out to continue the fight.
This unit inspires nearby troops to deal increased damage.
Half of the damage this unit takes is automatically dealt back to an enemy attacker.
This unit ignores Fatigue when deployed, charging into battle at full strength.
This unit has energy shield protection that absorbs damage and regenerates when out of combat.
This unit has special weaponry that steals health from its enemies equal to the damage dealt.
This unit cannot attack and instead focuses on support or healing skills to boost your army.
CSR ranks enabled. Team up for a ranked 2v2 Blitz battle, our most competitive tier of play.
CSR ranks enabled. Experience the glorious chaos of ranked 3v3 play as troops collide across the battlefield.
This card pack contains Blitz cards. You can open your new pack and play Blitz anytime from the Main Menu.
For first time completion, you have earned a special Blitz card pack. Enjoy! It can be opened later from the Blitz main menu.
You have no units, deploy reinforcements
Blitz packs contain 5 Blitz cards with at least 1 guaranteed Uncommon or better card.
DLC packs contain 5 Blitz cards specific to the purchased DLC leader.
The Oct 2016 Press Event pack contains 5 random Captain Cutter and Atriox cards.
Awarded for first-time Campaign Mission completion, this pack contains 5 specific Blitz cards.
Blitz packs contain 5 Blitz cards with at least 1 guaranteed Rare or Legendary card.
